TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ConnectivityStatus extends System.Object
public ref class ConnectivityStatus abstract sealed

summary.span: 代表應用程式網路連線的狀態。

span.span: Represents the status of an application's network connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來指定以 Windows 為基礎的應用程式，使用用戶端應用程式服務的網路連線能力。Use the class to specify the network connectivity of Windows-based applications that use client application services. 當您設定屬性設`true`，用戶端服務提供者使用 「 離線快取而不是嘗試存取對應的 Web 服務。When you set the property to `true`, the client service providers use the offline cache instead of attempting to access the corresponding Web services. 離線的狀態會儲存每位使用者及每個應用程式的基礎。The offline status is stored on a per-user and per-application basis. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何：使用用戶端應用程式服務離線工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38)。For more information, see [How to: Work Offline with Client Application Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f792cb16-8520-4a0f-9dc9-07bfbc454e38). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個類別來更新離線狀態 核取方塊的值而定。The following example code demonstrates how to use this class to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此範例中，事件處理常式更新離線狀態。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果使用者設定為線上狀態的應用程式，事件處理常式會嘗試重新驗證使用者。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 不過，如果驗證伺服器無法使用時，事件處理常式會傳回應用程式為離線狀態。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]

public: static property bool IsOffline { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.IsOffline : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示應用程式是否處於離線模式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an application is in offline mode.

value.span: 如果應用程式處於離線模式，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the application is in offline mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定屬性，類別會快取到本機檔案系統的值。When you set the property, the class caches the value to the local file system. 在用戶端服務提供者命名空間檢查此值，以判斷是否要使用離線資料快取而不是嘗試存取相關聯[!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)]驗證、 角色和設定檔服務。The client service providers in the namespace check this value to determine whether to use the offline data cache instead of attempting to access the associated [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_short](~/includes/ajax-current-short-md.md)] authentication, roles, and profile services. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來更新離線狀態 核取方塊的值而定。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to update the offline status depending on a check box value. 在此範例中，事件處理常式更新離線狀態。In this example, a event handler updates the offline status. 如果使用者設定為線上狀態的應用程式，事件處理常式會嘗試重新驗證使用者。If the user sets the application to the online state, the event handler attempts to revalidate the user. 不過，如果驗證伺服器無法使用時，事件處理常式會傳回應用程式為離線狀態。However, if the authentication server is unavailable, the event handler returns the application to the offline state. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#315)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#315](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#315)]
